name: Museumalistic
description:
A strange console lurks at the end of this museum... discover the hidden clues and find out the passcode.

Controls:
Move left/right with the arrow keys or WASD or ZQSD
Interact with Spacebar

(Note: There are more than one way to guess the solution)

Artistic direction inspired by "Don't Touch Anything" and "Crawl"

P.S: The source code is available on our Github : Museumalistic on Github.
